You are invited to participate in our April 14 School Board Meeting and Work Session by using the public link below. You must enable your video and mute your microphone. This is a formal public meeting and comments will only be allowed at designated times in the meeting. Rick Musselman is inviting you to a scheduled Zoom meeting. Topic: Board Meeting / Work Session April 14 2020 Time: Apr 14, 2020 07:00 PM Eastern Time (US and Canada) Join Zoom Meeting https://zoom.us/j/716467232?pwd=Zjd4RFE3cDhsUlZ1S3ZKeEdqVEZOUT09 Meeting ID: 716 467 232 Password: 885791
The change 16 story on MWHS’s virtual choir will air tonight, April 14th, at 7:00. Please tune in or record it if you can’t tune in live!
